#summary Release Notes

= Release Notes =

===1.4.2 Release Notes===
 * [http://code.google.com/p/tarlog-plugins/issues/detail?id=13 Issue 13] was fixed.

===1.4.1 Release Notes===
 * [http://code.google.com/p/tarlog-plugins/issues/detail?id=7 Issue 7] was fixed.
 * Some cosmetic changes: 
  * "Open in Windows Explorer" was changed to "Open Explorer"
  * "Open in Command Prompt" was changed to "Open Shell"
  * Logger templates were updated.
  * Most of the strings were externalized.

===1.4 Release Notes===
 * Copy the current path to clipboard ([http://code.google.com/p/tarlog-plugins/issues/detail?id=10 Issue 10])
 * [http://code.google.com/p/tarlog-plugins/issues/detail?id=9 Issue 9] was fixed.

===1.1.0 Release Notes===
 * Open in Command Prompt - opens command prompt from the current file or folder in the Package Explorer/Navigator.
 * Open in Windows Explorer - opens windows explorer with the selection on the current file or folder in the Package Explorer/Navigator.
